languages.text: "Вы видите кого-то, кто справился бы лучше?" {n}Лорд-инквизитор устало прикрывает глаза.{/n} "Поверьте, хоть мне и немало лет, в жизни моей все еще есть много гораздо более приятных вещей, чем бытие комендантом Простора. Но, увы, каждый владыка нашего сектора предпочитает ограничивать свои интересы благополучием своих владений, и только мне одному есть дело до всех".

"Do you see a better candidate for the job?" {n}The Lord Inquisitor closes his eyes wearily for a moment.{/n} "I may no longer be in the first flush of youth, but believe me when I say that there are many things I would much rather be doing than playing constable to the Koronus Expanse. But, alas, every ruler in our sector chooses to confine their concern to the well-being of their own holdings, whereas I alone must take care of all."
languages.original_text: "Вы видите кого-то, кто справился бы лучше?" {n}Лорд-инквизитор устало прикрывает глаза.{/n} "Поверьте, хоть мне и немало лет, в жизни моей все еще есть много гораздо более приятных вещей, чем бытие комендантом Простора. Но, увы, каждый владыка нашего сектора предпочитает ограничивать свои интересы благополучием своих владений, и только мне одному есть дело до всех".

But, alas, every ruler in our sector chooses to confine their concern to the well-being of their own holdings, whereas I alone must take care of all."

languages.text: “这件事情，你觉得还有更好的人选吗？”{n}大审判官疲惫地闭了一会儿眼睛。{/n}“或许我已经不再年轻气盛，但相信我，比起维持科罗努斯扩区的秩序，我还有很多更愿意做的事情。但遗憾的是，这个星区的每位统治者，都只关心他们自己领地的福祉，而我不得不靠一己之力，将所有人都照顾好。”
languages.original_text: "Do you see a better candidate for the job?" {n}The Lord Inquisitor closes his eyes wearily for a moment.{/n} "I may no longer be in the first flush of youth, but believe me when I say that there are many things I would much rather be doing than playing constable to the Koronus Expanse. But, alas, every ruler in our sector chooses to confine their concern to the well-being of their own holdings, whereas I alone must take care of all."

traits.locale_text: “这件事情，你觉得还有更好的人选吗？”{n}审判长疲惫地闭了一会儿眼睛。{/n}“或许我已经不再年轻气盛，但相信我，比起维持科罗努斯扩区的秩序，我还有很多更愿意做的事情。但遗憾的是，这个星区的每位统治者，都只关心他们自己领地的福祉，而我不得不靠一己之力，将所有人都照顾好。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «¿Acaso ve a algún candidato mejor?». {n}El Lord Inquisidor, cansado, cierra los ojos un momento.{/n} «Tal vez no esté en la flor de la juventud, pero le aseguro que hay muchas cosas que preferiría estar haciendo antes que ser el vigilante de la Extensión de Koronus. Pero, lamentablemente, todos los gobernantes del sector limitan su atención al bienestar de sus propias tierras, dejándome a mí solo para que me ocupe de todo».
languages.original_text: "Do you see a better candidate for the job?" {n}The Lord Inquisitor closes his eyes wearily for a moment.{/n} "I may no longer be in the first flush of youth, but believe me when I say that there are many things I would much rather be doing than playing constable to the Koronus Expanse. But, alas, every ruler in our sector chooses to confine their concern to the well-being of their own holdings, whereas I alone must take care of all."

traits.locale_text: «¿Acaso ve a algún candidato mejor?». {n}El Lord Inquisidor, cansado, cierra los ojos un momento.{/n} «Tal vez no esté en la flor de la juventud, pero le aseguro que hay muchas cosas que preferiría estar haciendo antes que ser el vigilante de la Extensión de Koronus. Pero, lamentablemente, todos los gobernantes del sector limitan su atención al bienestar de sus propias tierras, dejándome a mí solo para que me ocupe de todo».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「もっとふさわしい人物がいるというのか？」{n}ロード・インクィジターはうんざりした様子でしばらく目を閉じる。{/n}「私はもう若くはないかもしれないが、コロヌス・エクスパンスを巡視するより、もっとやりたいことがたくさんあると言って信じてもらえるだろうか。だが、哀れなるかな、私の担当地域の統治者はみな、己の資産の安全を気にする方を選ぶ。対して私は、ひとりで何もかもを管理しなくてはならないのだよ」
languages.original_text: "Do you see a better candidate for the job?" {n}The Lord Inquisitor closes his eyes wearily for a moment.{/n} "I may no longer be in the first flush of youth, but believe me when I say that there are many things I would much rather be doing than playing constable to the Koronus Expanse. But, alas, every ruler in our sector chooses to confine their concern to the well-being of their own holdings, whereas I alone must take care of all."

traits.locale_text: 「もっとふさわしい人物がいるというのか？」{n}ロード・インクィジターはうんざりした様子でしばらく目を閉じる。{/n}「私はもう若くはないかもしれないが、コロヌス・エクスパンスを巡視するより、もっとやりたいことがたくさんあると言って信じてもらえるだろうか。だが、哀れなるかな、私の担当地域の統治者はみな、己の資産の安全を気にする方を選ぶ。対して私は、ひとりで何もかもを管理しなくてはならないのだよ」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Avez-vous un meilleur candidat en vue ? » {n}Las, le seigneur inquisiteur ferme les yeux quelques instants.{/n} « Je ne suis peut-être plus de première jeunesse, mais vous pouvez me croire : j'aurais mille choses plus intéressantes à faire que de jouer au gendarme dans les Étendues de Koronus. Hélas, tous les dirigeants de notre secteur ont décidé de limiter leur préoccupation au bien-être de leurs possessions personnelles, laissant tout le reste à ma charge. »
languages.original_text: "Do you see a better candidate for the job?" {n}The Lord Inquisitor closes his eyes wearily for a moment.{/n} "I may no longer be in the first flush of youth, but believe me when I say that there are many things I would much rather be doing than playing constable to the Koronus Expanse. But, alas, every ruler in our sector chooses to confine their concern to the well-being of their own holdings, whereas I alone must take care of all."

traits.locale_text: « Avez-vous un meilleur candidat en vue ? » {n}Las, le seigneur inquisiteur ferme les yeux quelques instants.{/n} « Je ne suis peut-être plus de première jeunesse, mais vous pouvez me croire : j'aurais mille choses plus intéressantes à faire que de jouer au gendarme dans les Étendues de Koronus. Hélas, tous les dirigeants de notre secteur ont décidé de limiter leur préoccupation au bien-être de leurs possessions personnelles, laissant tout le reste à ma charge. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Kennt Ihr einen besseren Kandidaten für den Job?" {n}Der Großinquisitor schließt für einen Moment ermattet die Augen.{/n} "Der Sturm und Drang der Jugend mag hinter mir liegen, aber glaubt mir, wenn ich sage, dass ich viele Dinge lieber täte, als in der Koronus-Ausdehnung Polizei zu spielen. Aber leider beschränken alle Herrscher in unserem Sektor ihre Bemühungen auf das Wohlbefinden des eigenen Besitzes, wohingegen ich mich alleine um alle kümmern muss."
languages.original_text: "Do you see a better candidate for the job?" {n}The Lord Inquisitor closes his eyes wearily for a moment.{/n} "I may no longer be in the first flush of youth, but believe me when I say that there are many things I would much rather be doing than playing constable to the Koronus Expanse. But, alas, every ruler in our sector chooses to confine their concern to the well-being of their own holdings, whereas I alone must take care of all."

traits.locale_text: "Kennt Ihr einen besseren Kandidaten für den Job?" {n}Der Großinquisitor schließt für einen Moment ermattet die Augen.{/n} "Der Sturm und Drang der Jugend mag hinter mir liegen, aber glaubt mir, wenn ich sage, dass ich viele Dinge lieber täte, als in der Koronus-Ausdehnung Polizei zu spielen. Aber leider beschränken alle Herrscher in unserem Sektor ihre Bemühungen auf das Wohlbefinden des eigenen Besitzes, wohingegen ich mich alleine um alle kümmern muss."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Bu iş için daha uygun biri var mı sence?" {n}Lord Engizisyoncu, bitkin gözlerini bir müddet kapatıyor.{/n} "Artık gençlik yıllarımda olmayabilirim ama inan ki Koronus Enginliği'nin emniyetiyle uğraşmaktansa yapmak isteyeceğim çok fazla şey var. Ama görüldüğü gibi sektörümüzdeki hükümdarların her biri kendi mülklerinin iyiliğini düşünebiliyorken ben hepsini düşünmek durumundayım."
languages.original_text: "Do you see a better candidate for the job?" {n}The Lord Inquisitor closes his eyes wearily for a moment.{/n} "I may no longer be in the first flush of youth, but believe me when I say that there are many things I would much rather be doing than playing constable to the Koronus Expanse. But, alas, every ruler in our sector chooses to confine their concern to the well-being of their own holdings, whereas I alone must take care of all."
